ModMetaData.name: Alpha Crafts
ModMetaData.author: Sarg Bjornson
ModMetaData.description:
Step into a world of refined flavors and artisanal craft with Alpha Crafts! Discover a rich array of handmade goods and culinary treasures, from intricate condiments to specialty teas, fermented beverages, and traditional essentials like pipe tobacco. Whether preparing an energizing tea blend, a warming coffee liqueur, or a barrel-aged artisanal kombucha, each creation brings its own flair and subtle impact to the world, inviting players to master the art of fine crafting.
Tired of endless, boring Yayo-fueled economies? Well, try a colony that thrives on trading Surströming. Or Miso. Or one of the other 50 artisanal products!
